EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> DEFENSE & SPACE MARCH TOWARD THE BATTLEFIELD Make sure you're mission ready with our battlefield solutions
- Navigation equipment to make sure you're on target - Innovations to keep you safe - Communication to the troops - Efficiency on the battlefield
